articles.title: Asia Cup Hockey 2022: Resurgent India avenge group defeat, beat Japan 2-1 in Super 4 pool match - India Today
articles.description: Asian Cup Hockey 2022: Indian men's team defeated Japan 2-1 in its opening match of the Super4s stage in Jakarta on Saturday.

articles.title: Double Academy Award winner Kevin Spacey to face 4 sex assault charges in Britain - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Crown Prosecution Service said it had "authorised criminal charges" on the four sex assault counts and one of "causing a person to engage in penetrative sexual activity without consent."

articles.title: Ian Fang returns to using original name for 'reincarnation' — and other local celebs who changed their names - AsiaOne
